publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4592 Miss Annabel Goldie: Regeneration of Inverclyde—That the Parliament notes the various initiatives being undertaken in Inverclyde to regenerate the economy and to improve the physical and social environment; congratulates all relevant agencies and organisations involved in these initiatives, and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that the needs of Inverclyde remain paramount when considering any other national or strategic objectives.

*S2M-4592# Miss Annabel Goldie: Regeneration of Inverclyde—That the Parliament notes the various initiatives being undertaken in Inverclyde to regenerate the economy and to improve the physical and social environment; congratulates all relevant agencies and organisations involved in these initiatives, and *considers that* the Scottish Executive *should* ensure that the needs of Inverclyde remain paramount when considering any other national or strategic objectives. Supported by: Mr David Davidson* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4592# Regeneration of Inverclyde (lodged on 20 June 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Derek Brownlee*, Donald Gorrie*, Murdo Fraser*, Murray Tosh*, Margaret Mitchell*, Dave Petrie*, Bill Aitken*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S2M-4592# Miss Annabel Goldie: Regeneration of Inverclyde—That the Parliament notes the various initiatives being undertaken in Inverclyde to regenerate the economy and to improve the physical and social environment; congratulates all relevant agencies and organisations involved in these initiatives, and considers that the Scottish Executive should ensure that the needs of Inverclyde remain paramount when considering any other national or strategic objectives. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Mrs Nanette Milne, Derek Brownlee, Donald Gorrie, Murdo Fraser, Murray Tosh, Margaret Mitchell, Dave Petrie, Bill Aitken, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton
S2M-4592# Regeneration of Inverclyde (lodged on 20 June 2006) Mr Ted Brocklebank*
